notesStmt.note: "The argument" initialed: S.R., i.e. Samuel Rowlands.
On the Dutch rebel John Leyden.
Running title reads: The life and death of Iohn Leyden.
Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
